author: titan
title: Account authentication
description: Cada conta de serviço on-line requer a criação de um usuário e senha e pode ser hackeada ou você pode esquecê-la.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer correctly identifies the potential impact to be significant. For  all of us, crypto enthusiasts or not. The crypto wallet is a great resource. Adoption is another thing, and the proposer realistically separates development from adoption. Humble and practical. Finally his analysis of the environment is practical.
f6_assessments.q1: I doubt that the community will find more highly qualified "tool-makers' than this proposer, to take on development of a potentially very useful tool. His experience as a tool-maker is just what we need. Finally, pointing out that there is already a successful implementation of his idea makes feasibility greater. I agree whole heartedly.
f6_assessments.q2: Can not ask for more information to validate the project than what has been offered. As a committed Cardano community member, it would be quite unlikely that he would be faking his ability and commitment to delivering  results. And in this case, the proof will be in the puddin'

f6_assessments.q0:
Sounds like a good idea to me. Who has not once forgotten a password and had to take steps to recover it? And not only that, I am sure that many of us have found that someone had hacked us and we had lost control of our account completely.
This project is a good option to forget about all these complications and have a really secure access to our accounts.
f6_assessments.q1:
It is clearly an idea that many of us will agree with.
An easy and effective way to keep our online information protected just like we do with our homes. Only we own our keys, and so it should be with our cloud platforms as well.
It is a project that, with solid work and good planning, can be successful.
f6_assessments.q2:
I am a person who does not have technical knowledge in this field and probably is missing an explanation that allows me to clearly understand the planning.
Sure there is a lot of work behind this proposal, I do not doubt it, but perhaps the roadmap could be improved.
This idea, with the steps to follow well established, could be very good.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal have a big impact in the DApps & Integrations challenge, because it enables simplification while retaining security. Simplification + Security is key for expanding adoption and onboarding new users / projects, while being competitive with other Blockchain projects.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer credentials clearly demonstrate his skills. The budget is adequate and caters for unforeseen circumstances. The only aspects to de-risk are the size of the team (Bus factor=1) and the possible lack of feedback: internal as there is a single developer, and external (to stakeholders) as there is no plan to gather feedback from clients of the application. Still 5 stars as the above aspects are almost completely de-risked by adding comprehensive documentation and addressing bugs submitted by the community.
f6_assessments.q2: The project is clearly auditable in terms of the roadmap/implementation. However, it is missing key metrics related to the challenge: the measurement of Growth / Adoption. To improve the proposal, after the project launch, I would monitor the number of downloads, number of active users, and number of projects using this type of authentication.

solution: Uma extensão web que usa sua carteira HD para assinar mensagens de autenticação e permite que você entre nos serviços on-line. O backup está em sua carteira.
experience: Vencedor do prêmio no desafio Plutus Pioneer Capstone. Programação desde a infância.
